## Overview

This is an R Markdown document aiming to wrangle the data for residents asthma rates that ages between 0 and 17 in NYC from 2018 to 2020.

## Load packages

```{r packages, message = FALSE}
getwd()
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(dplyr)

```

## Load data

```{r data, message = FALSE}
NYC_Asthma = read.csv("./Data/RawData/AD-SubCountyData.csv", stringsAsFactors = TRUE)

```

## Clean the origional dataset

```{r clean original data, message = FALSE}
NYC_Asthma_clean = NYC_Asthma %>% colnames = c("Indicator", "Data Year", "Zipcode", "Numbers", "Rate by 10,000")

```
